title: Everest Base Camp Trekking
overview: Embark on the Everest Base Camp trek, a journey through the heart of the Himalayas with breathtaking scenery and diverse landscapes.
Experience the rich culture of the Sherpa community, staying in traditional tea houses along the route.
Culminate at the iconic Everest Base Camp and nearby Kala Patthar for sunrise views.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Meet our representatives and trip briefing.

itinerary.title: Fly to Lukla and Trek to Phakding
itinerary.description: Fly to Lukla (2,840 m) and trek to Phakding (2,620 m).

itinerary.title: Lobuche to Gorak Shep and Everest Base Camp
itinerary.description: Reach Gorak Shep (5,170 m) and visit Everest Base Camp (5,364 m).

itinerary.title: Gorak Shep to Kala Patthar and to Pheriche
itinerary.description: Climb Kala Patthar (5,545 m) and descend to Pheriche (4,243 m).

itinerary.title: Pheriche to Namche Bazaar
itinerary.description: Trek back to Namche Bazaar (3,440 m).
